badges.text:
Here's the list of all food buffs:
- Apples give regeneration 1 up to 1 heart healed
- Berries give a bit more hunger and saturation.
- Glow berries highlight you for 10 seconds.
- Golden apples give 4 absorption hearts.
- Notch apples give strength 2 for 90 seconds.
- Melons give jump boost 2 for 10 seconds.
- Chorus Fruit gives Resistance for a second
- Tomatoes from Farmer's Delight mod give Fire resistance for 15 seconds.
